text: Different analytical techniques have been described for the qualitative and quantitative determination of alkaloids in both wild plant and in vitro culture of Amaryllidaceae including GC - MS [ 2 , 11 , 12 ] , spectrophotometric [ 2 ] , HPTLC [ 11 , 13 ] , and enzyme immunoassay [ 2 ] . Few HPLC methods coupled with various detection methods were described for determination of lycorine in Amaryllidaceae plants such as Galanthus species [ 7 ] , Leucojum aestivum , and Pancratium 2
